mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.recycle_reserve_uuid_number as recyclereserveUuidNumber ,a.recycle_id as recycleId ,a.member_id as memberId ,a.recycle_reserve_text as recyclereserveText ,a.recycle_transport_time as recycletransportTime ,a.recycle_reserve_yesno_types as recyclereserveYesnoTypes ,a.recycle_reserve_yesno_text as recyclereserveYesnoText ,a.recycle_reserve_shenhe_time as recyclereserveShenheTime ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,recycle.recycle_name as recycleName ,recycle.recycle_uuid_number as recycleUuidNumber ,recycle.recycle_photo as recyclePhoto ,recycle.recycle_address as recycleAddress ,recycle.recycle_types as recycleTypes ,recycle.recycle_kucun_number as recycleKucunNumber ,recycle.recycle_time as recycleTime ,recycle.recycle_content as recycleContent ,recycle.recycle_delete as recycleDelete ,member.member_name as memberName ,member.member_phone as memberPhone ,member.member_id_number as memberIdNumber ,member.member_photo as memberPhoto ,member.member_email as memberEmail
FROM recycle_reserve a left JOIN recycle recycle ON a.recycle_id = recycle.id left JOIN member member ON a.member_id = member.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.recycle_reserve_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.recyclereserveUuidNumber},'%')
and ( a.recycle_id = #{params.recycleId} )
and ( a.member_id = #{params.memberId} )
and a.recycle_reserve_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.recyclereserveText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.recycle_transport_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.recycletransportTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.recycle_transport_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.recycletransportTimeEnd})
and a.recycle_reserve_yesno_types = #{params.recyclereserveYesnoTypes}
and a.recycle_reserve_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.recyclereserveYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.recycle_reserve_shenhe_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.recyclereserveShenheTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.recycle_reserve_shenhe_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.recyclereserveShenheTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.recycle_id IS NOT NULL
and recycle.recycle_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.recycleName},'%')
and recycle.recycle_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.recycleUuidNumber},'%')
and recycle.recycle_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.recycleAddress},'%')
and recycle.recycle_types = #{params.recycleTypes}
and recycle.recycle_kucun_number >= #{params.recycleKucunNumberStart}
and recycle.recycle_kucun_number <= #{params.recycleKucunNumberEnd}
and recycle.recycle_kucun_number = #{params.recycleKucunNumber}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(recycle.recycle_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.recycleTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(recycle.recycle_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.recycleTimeEnd})
and recycle.recycle_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.recycleContent},'%')
and recycle.recycle_delete >= #{params.recycleDeleteStart}
and recycle.recycle_delete <= #{params.recycleDeleteEnd}
and recycle.recycle_delete = #{params.recycleDelete}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(recycle.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(recycle.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.member_id IS NOT NULL
and member.member_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.memberName},'%')
and member.member_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.memberPhone},'%')
and member.member_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.memberIdNumber},'%')
and member.member_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.memberEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
